name: Elementals Reborn
description: In Elementals Reborn you will explore the forgotten lands and fight their inhabitants. Increase your rate by fighting in different modes, alone or with allies. In Elementals Reborn, you can find entertainment of your own!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core 2  @ 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+@ 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB, DirectX 9-compatible, Pixel Shader 3.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
